1-1.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
1-1.Text: Rescue your girlfirend, bring the president home, and save America

1-2.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
1-2.Text: Reports from the air says it looks like [shake]HELL[/shake] out there!

1-2.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
1-2.Text: Act quick and show no mercy!

1-3.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
1-3.Text: Looks like the boss of this level is up a head.

1-3.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
1-3.Text: Hold your fire until you have a clear shot
